shortDescription.text: Each Covered File MUST have Copyright Information associated with it.
shortDescription.markdown: Each Covered File **MUST** have **[Copright](https://reuse.software/faq/#what-is-copyright)** associated with it.

shortDescription.text: Each Covered File MUST have License Information associated with it.
shortDescription.markdown: Each Covered File **MUST** have **[Licensing Information](https://reuse.software/faq/#what-is-license)** associated with it.

shortDescription.text: The SPDX License Identifier ({0}) MUST be LicenseRef-[letters, numbers, ".", or "-"] as defined by the SPDX Specification
shortDescription.markdown: The SPDX License Identifier (`<ID>`) **MUST** be `LicenseRef-`[`letters`, `numbers`, `.`, or `-`] as defined by the [SPDX Specification](https://spdx.github.io/spdx-spec/v2.3/)

shortDescription.text: The Project MUST include a License File for every license, but is missing {0}.
shortDescription.markdown: The Project **MUST** include a License File for every license, but is missing `${license}`.

shortDescription.text: The Project MUST NOT include License Files ({0}) for licenses under which none of the files in the Project are licensed.
shortDescription.markdown: The Project **MUST NOT** include License Files (`<LICENSE>`) for licenses under which none of the files in the Project are licensed.

shortDescription.text: The Project MUST NOT include duplicate SPDX identifiers ({0}).
shortDescription.markdown: The Project **MUST NOT** include duplicate SPDX identifiers (`<ID>`).
